root.name: beatmania IIDX 18 Resort Anthem
root.description: Summarybeatmania IIDX 18: Resort Anthem is the 19th game in the beatmania IIDX series. Location testing were scheduled for April 22nd through April 26th, April 30th through May 6th, May 14th through May 20th and June 11th through June 1th in 2010. The game was released on September 15th, 2010.
